title: WriteDeadband (Method)
text:
METHOD WriteDeadband :
Error
Issue a write request to Object 34 (Analog Input Deadbands)

rows.Name: qualifier
rows.Comment:
address qualifier, must be 8/16 bit indexed or 8/16 bit
start/stop

rows:
object variation to use in request1 - 16 bit                           (this was added in subset level 4)
2 - 32 bit                           (this was added in subset level 4)
3 - Single Precision Floating Point  (this was added in subset level 4)
number of deadbands in this request
